scripts.test: npm run-script jshint && npm run-script check-style && npm run-script unit-test-coverage && npm run-script func-test
scripts.unit-test-coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u bdd -R spec --recursive test/lib test/techs
scripts.func-test: npm run-script bh-sym && npm run-script build-sample-proj && mocha -u bdd -R spec --recursive test/func
scripts.bh-sym: mkdir -p node_modules/bh/node_modules && rm -f node_modules/bh/node_modules/enb && ln -s ../../.. node_modules/bh/node_modules/enb
scripts.check-style: jscs -c node_modules/enb-validate-code/jscs.json lib exlib techs test
